title.vi: TOP 8 Best Places to Buy Eyelash Extension Supplies in HCMC (2025)
title.en: TOP 8 Best Places to Buy Eyelash Extension Supplies in HCMC (2025)

excerpt.vi: A complete guide to the 8 best professional lash supply stores in HCMC. Leading the list is Nanky Beauty (District 2), distributing premium imported materials for Masters.
excerpt.en: A complete guide to the 8 best professional lash supply stores in HCMC. Leading the list is Nanky Beauty (District 2), distributing premium imported materials for Masters.

content.vi:
Eyelash extensions are one of the most popular beauty services loved by many women. However, to achieve good results, choosing quality lash tools is crucial. If you are looking for reputable places to buy lash supplies in HCMC, we have compiled a list of the top 8 trusted addresses.

1. Nanky Beauty – Premium Lash Supply Provider (District 2)

Address: 71 Vanh Dai Tay, An Khanh Ward, District 2, HCMC (Thao Dien Area)

Supply Hotline: 0852.759.678

Opening Hours: 08:00 – 21:00 (Daily)

Rating: 5.0 ⭐ - The source of high-end supplies for Masters in Thao Dien.

Not only an international class lash salon, Nanky Beauty is also a leading distributor of premium lash supplies that they trust and use daily. This is the 'golden' address for professional technicians and salons wanting to upgrade their services, committed to using only the best products.

Nanky Beauty's strength is specializing in providing 100% imported products from Korea, USA, UK (such as BL Lash glue, Sky Glue, Lash Box LA lashes, London Lash Pro). Unlike cheap suppliers, Nanky focuses on quality, safety, and ultra-light lash materials (Exclusive Feather Lashes, Rabbit Lashes), ensuring the most premium experience.

2. Sunway Beauty – Quality lash tool shop in HCMC

Address: 431A Le Trong Tan, Son Ky Ward, Tan Phu District, HCMC

Hotline: 0868 531 378

Sunway Beauty is a famous unit specializing in distributing and manufacturing false eyelashes in HCMC. It has become a wholesale and retail brand trusted by many customers.

3. Nha Mi Xinh

Address: 479/7 Nguyen Tri Phuong, Ward 8, District 10, HCMC

Hotline: 0939 446 447

If you are looking for a reputable address to shop for diverse lash accessories at affordable prices, Nha Mi Xinh is a great suggestion.

4. Thai Ha Lash Tools

Address: 416/15/1c9 Duong Quang Ham, Ward 5, Go Vap District, HCMC

Hotline: 0964 499 179

Thai Ha lash tools is a reliable choice with more than 8 years of experience specializing in supplying wholesale and retail lashes.

5. Hani Lash Tools & Accessories

Address: 161 Hoa Lan, Ward 2, Phu Nhuan District, HCMC

Hotline: 0707 551 095

Hani Lash commits to bringing customers high-quality products that meet export standards.

6. Ngoc Bich Nail & Lash Accessories

Address: 306 Le Duc Tho, Ward 6, Go Vap District, HCMC

Hotline: 0978 855 986

Ngoc Bich Nail & Lash Accessories is one of the stores specializing in providing wholesale and retail beauty products.

7. Ha Linh Lash Accessories

Address: 26/4A, My Hoa 1 Hamlet, Trung Chanh Commune, Hoc Mon District, HCMC

Hotline: 0917 980 196

Ha Linh Lash Accessories specializes in wholesale and retail of lash accessories such as lash glue, lash tools, and false lashes.

8. Kim Beauty Lashes

Address: 124 Nguyen Thai Hoc, Tan Thanh Ward, Tan Phu District, HCMC

Hotline: 0988 443 337

Kim Beauty Lashes is a famous brand for providing lash accessories in Vietnam, importing 100% from Korea and Thailand.

So we have helped you get a list of the Top 8 reputable lash tool buying addresses in HCMC. For premium quality, visit Nanky Beauty in District 2.
